def main():
    from string import ascii_lowercase as al
    t = input()
    for i in xrange(t):
        string = raw_input().strip()
        d = {}
        ans = ""
        indx = 0
        for _ in string:
            try:
                ans += d[_]
            except:
                d[_] = al[indx]
                ans += al[indx]
                indx += 1
        print ans
main()
